\draw node[fill,gray,circle,inner sep=1pt,minimum size = 1.2cm] (ball) at (5.5,2.9) {};
\node (ballLabel) at (6.7,2.3) {\small{$B_{\varepsilon}(x_{0})$}};
\path[->,line width=1pt] (ballLabel.north)[yshift=-1.2mm] edge[bend right=20] (ball);


\draw node[fill,circle,inner sep=0pt,minimum size=1.2mm] (pt1Right) at
(5.5,2.9) {};
\node at (pt1Right.south) [yshift = -2.5mm] {\large{$x_{0}$}};
\draw node[fill,circle,inner sep=0pt,minimum size=1.2mm] (pt2Right) at
(6.5,1.5) {};
\node at (pt2Right.south) [yshift = -2.5mm] {\large{$x$}};

\draw node[fill,circle,inner sep=0pt,minimum size=1.2mm] (pt1Left) at
(1.5,2.9) {};
\node at (pt1Left.south) [yshift = -2.5mm] {\large{$x_{0}$}};
\draw node[fill,circle,inner sep=0pt,minimum size=1.2mm] (pt2Left) at
(2.5,1.5) {};
\node at (pt2Left.south) [yshift = -2.5mm] {\large{$x$}};

\node at (1.5,1.8) {\Large{$\Omega$}};
\node at (5.5,1.8) {\Large{$\Omega_{\varepsilon}$}};

\node at (3.7,1.0) {\Large{$\Gamma$}};
\node at (7.6,1.0) {\Large{$\Gamma$}};

\path[->,line width=1.5pt] (3,3.5) edge[bend left=40] (5,3.5);


\end{tikzpicture}
